stubuserwikiauth-desc: Performs authentication for imported users against a remote wiki, providing the same user and password used on the remote wiki.
stubuserwikiauth-resetpass: Account successfully activated. To increase the security of your account, you should use a different password for each site. It's highly recommended to set a different password here. You can skip it clicking on "{{int:authprovider-resetpass-skip-label}}" and set it later from your preferences.
